original_text: Therefore, when he was gone out, Jesus said, Now is the Son of man glorified, and God is glorified in him.
korean_text: 그가 나간 후에 예수께서 이르시되 지금 인자가 영광을 받았고 하나님도 인자로 말미암아 영광을 받으셨도다

sentences.original_text: Therefore, when he was gone out,
Now is the Son of man glorified,
and God is glorified in him.
